thought: The Slack message sending is failing because the channel parameter is not properly set in the Slack action params. I will set the Slack action parameters explicitly with the correct channel mode and value.
plan: Set 'select' parameter to 'channel' to send message to a channel.
Set 'channelId' parameter with mode 'name' and value '#general'.
Ensure 'text' parameter is passed from input data.
Test Slack action with these parameters.
criticism: Currently the Slack action has empty params, which causes execution failure.

tool_input.comments: Send classification results to Slack channel #general with proper channel parameters.

tool_output.error: input parameter is null, "blocksUi" for action_2. You should put something in it.
